REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f1208 reute b f BC-/-FED-EXPECTED-TO-TAK 03-19 0081

TEXT.TITLE: FED EXPECTED TO TAKE NO MONEY MARKET ACTION
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Reserve is expected to refrain from reserve-management intervention in the U.S. Government securities market, economists said. If the Fed does act, however, they said it would be likely to add temporary reserves indirectly by arranging around 1.5 billion dlrs of customer repurchase agreements. Federal funds, which averaged 5.97 pct yesterday, opened at six pct and remained there in early trading. Reuter
